remarks: The mapping from the index set to the generators is a function into the free group.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
statement:
vrgpfval.r $e |- .~ = ( ~FG ` I ) $.
vrgpfval.u $e |- U = ( varFGrp ` I ) $.
vrgpf.m $e |- G = ( freeGrp ` I ) $.
vrgpf.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
vrgpf $p |- ( I e. V -> U : I --> X ) $.
